mapper.insert: insert into t_menu (id, sort, parent_id, name, href, is_show, permission, icon) values (#{id}, #{sort}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{href}, #{isShow}, #{permission}, #{icon})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_menu a where parent_id=#{0} order by sort
select max(id) from t_menu where parent_id=#{0};
SELECT * FROM t_menu a where parent_id=#{0} and is_show=1 order by sort

select a.* from t_menu a LEFT JOIN t_menu b on b.id=a.parent_id JOIN t_role_menu c on c.menu_id=a.id JOIN t_role d on d.id=c.role_id JOIN t_user_role e ON e.role_id = d.id JOIN t_user f on f.id=e.user_id and f.username=#{0}
mapper.update: update t_menu set sort = #{sort}, parent_id = #{parentId}, name = #{name}, href = #{href}, is_show = #{isShow}, icon = #{icon}, permission = #{permission} where id = #{id}
